item.title: The First 100
item.description:
The First 100

In another life, I used to hold the conceit that I could write pretty well. I had a Blogger account with a modest following and I was pretty proud of it. I am not going to link my actual defunct blog here, because I cringe a lot now when I read some of my old posts. However, I have also not deleted the blog and, given the title of this one, it should not be hard to find, so have at it if you are curious.

item.title: Test Site
item.description:
Test Site

What's up? This is the first post on my blag on The Grid.
